title: 第 11 集 打嗝！ | Hiccups!

data.zh: 打嗝！
data.en: Hiccups!

data.zh: 佩奇，乔治，妈妈和爸爸正在吃早餐。
data.en: Peppa, George, Mummy and Daddy are having breakfast.

data.zh: 今天天气明媚，阳光灿烂，
data.en: It is a lovely, sunny day,

data.zh: 佩奇和乔治逼不及待要去花园玩
data.en: and Peppa and George can't wait to go into the garden to play.

data.zh: 妈妈，我们可以出去玩了吗？
data.en: Mummy, please, can we go out to play?

data.zh: 等你们吃完早餐就可以出去玩了。
data.en: You can go out to play when you finish your breakfast.

data.zh: 乔治！果汁不要喝得那么快。
data.en: George! Don't drink your juice too quickly!

data.zh: 乔治喝果汁喝得太快了，
data.en: George drank his juice too quickly,

data.zh: 现在他打嗝了。
data.en: and now he has hiccups.

data.zh: 我们现在可以出去玩吗，妈妈？
data.en: Can we go out to play now, Mummy?

data.zh: 现在不行因为乔治在打嗝。
data.en: Not while George has hiccups.

data.zh: 但是乔治已经不打嗝了，妈妈。
data.en: But George's hiccups have gone, Mummy.

data.zh: 没打嗝了吧，乔治？
data.en: Haven't they, George?

data.zh: 哦，好吧，你们可以出去玩了。
data.en: Oh, alright, you can go out and play.

data.zh: 但是照顾好乔治。
data.en: But look after George.

data.zh: 佩奇和乔治喜欢在花园里玩。
data.en: Peppa and George love playing in the garden.

data.zh: 乔治，我准备扔球了，然后你要接住哦。
data.en: George. I'm going to throw the ball, and then you have to catch it.

data.zh: 乔治，请不要再打嗝了！
data.en: George, please stop hiccupping!

data.zh: 乔治！ 现在你把球扔给我，然后我接住球。
data.en: George! Now you throw the ball to me, and I have to catch it.

data.zh: 乔治！
data.en: George!

data.zh: 哦，糟糕，乔治的打嗝让他们没办法玩游戏。
data.en: Oh, dear, George's hiccups are spoiling the game.

data.zh: 乔治。。。我知道怎样治好打嗝！
data.en: George... I know how to cure hiccups!

data.zh: 你得按我说的做。
data.en: You have to do what I say.

data.zh: 你在挠你头顶的同时按摸你的肚子！
data.en: Rub the top of your head and rub your tummy!

data.zh: 好！现在你的打嗝没了！
data.en: Good! Now your hiccups have gone!

data.zh: 佩奇治打嗝的办法似乎没凑效。
data.en: Peppa's cure for hiccups doesn't seem to have worked.

data.zh: 乔治！你全都做错了！
data.en: George! You have done it all wrong!

data.zh: 我知道一个更好的办法治好打嗝！
data.en: I know a better way to cure hiccups!

data.zh: 首先，单腿上下跳三下！
data.en: First, jump up and down three times on one leg!

data.zh: 现在，上下挥动你的手臂
data.en: Now, wave your arms up and down

data.zh: 并且伸出你的舌头！
data.en: and stick your tongue out!

data.zh: 现在。。。闭上你的眼睛，
data.en: And now... close your eyes,

data.zh: 然后快速转三圈！
data.en: and turn around quickly, three times!

data.zh: 佩奇的新治法也没有凑效。
data.en: Peppa's new cure hasn't worked, either.

data.zh: 乔治仍然打嗝。
data.en: George still has hiccups.

data.zh: 我知道了！
data.en: I know!

data.zh: 要治好打嗝，必须要给打嗝的小猪惊吓才行！
data.en: To cure hiccups, the ill piggy must be given a shock!

data.zh: 乔治，我准备吓唬你了。
data.en: George, I'm going to scare you.

data.zh: 但是你必须记住，
data.en: But you must remember,

data.zh: 它只是个游戏，它可以治好你的打嗝。
data.en: it's only a game and it will stop your hiccups.

data.zh: 记住，这只是假装吓唬。
data.en: Remember, this is just pretend scaring.

data.zh: 佩奇！你不应该和乔治玩得那么粗暴！
data.en: Peppa! You mustn't play so roughly with George!

data.zh: 他还很小。
data.en: He's only little.

data.zh: 对不起，妈妈。
data.en: Sorry, Mummy.

data.zh: 我只是尝试着帮乔治治好打嗝。
data.en: I was just trying to stop George's hiccups.

data.zh: 乔治的打嗝没了！
data.en: George's hiccups have gone!

data.zh: 猪爸爸走来了，拿着二杯果汁。
data.en: Here comes Daddy Pig, with two beakers of juice.

data.zh: 乔治！如果你喝太快，你又会打嗝的！
data.en: George! If you drink too quickly, you will get hiccups again!

data.zh: 我不像乔治那么小。
data.en: I'm not as little as George.

data.zh: 我可以想喝多快就多快！
data.en: I can drink juice as quickly as I want to!
